name: bootstrap-loader-css-modules-example
description: Example usage of bootstrap-loader and CSS Modules

scripts.prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run build && nodemon --watch server.prod.js server.prod.js
scripts.bs3: npm run cleanrc && BOOTSTRAPRC_LOCATION=.bootstraprc-3-example nodemon --watch app/markup --ext html server.dev.js
scripts.bs4: npm run cleanrc && BOOTSTRAPRC_LOCATION=.bootstraprc-4-example nodemon --watch app/markup --ext html server.dev.js
scripts.bs3:prod: npm run cleanrc && export BOOTSTRAPRC_LOCATION=.bootstraprc-3-example && npm run build && npm run prod
scripts.bs4:prod: npm run cleanrc && export BOOTSTRAPRC_LOCATION=.bootstraprc-4-example && npm run build && npm run prod
scripts.bs3:default:prod: npm run bs3:default:setup && npm run prod
scripts.bs4:default:prod: npm run bs4:default:setup && npm run prod
scripts.install-local: rm -rf node_modules/bootstrap-loader && npm install --save-dev ../.. && npm run post-install
